name: AttachmentStatus
title: Attachment Status
description: Attachment Status codes for insurance operations.

concept.display: Agent/Broker is retaining a Copy on File
concept.definition: Agent/Broker is retaining a Copy on File — attachment status code.

designation.value: Le courtier conserve une copie au dossier

concept.display: Agent/Broker is Sending a Copy via Mail/Courier
concept.definition: Agent/Broker is Sending a Copy via Mail/Courier — attachment status code.

designation.value: Le courtier envoie une copie par la poste/messager

concept.display: Document Not Available Yet / Will be Forwarded Upon Receipt
concept.definition: Document Not Available Yet / Will be Forwarded Upon Receipt — attachment status code.

designation.value: Document pas encore disponible / sera envoyé dès que reçu

concept.display: Document Not Available Yet / Will be Kept in Files Upon Receipt
concept.definition: Document Not Available Yet / Will be Kept in Files Upon Receipt — attachment status code.

designation.value: Document pas encore disponible / sera conservé au dossier dès que reçu
